abstract_summ: Four months into the crisis, many questions remain over covid-19 in pregnancyMany drugs and vaccines are now being developed and testedHow long do viruses like cold, flu and coronavirus survive outside the body?The spread of the coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 has predictable features.What factors affect this?Two thought provoking comments related to understanding the problems with the coronavirus are presented.
title_summ: Viral survivalTwo simple comments regarding coronavirusCoronavirus may cross placentaThe hunt for covid-19 drugsModeling infectious disease dynamics.
